name: Gradient.Stop
desc: One color stop in the gradient.

items.name: init(color: Color, location: CGFloat)
items.desc: Creates a color stop with a color and location.

items.name: var location: CGFloat
items.desc: The parametric location of the stop.

items.name: static func == (Gradient.Stop, Gradient.Stop) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two stops are equal.
